title: Congress has a million-plus documents from Big Tech antitrust investigation, and are ready to grill big-name CEOs
text: For more than a year, the federal government has circled Big Tech and its business practices.

title: Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google CEO hearing rescheduled to Wednesday
text: The major congressional hearing on competition in the U.S. tech sector has been delayed two days to Wednesday.

title: The Hidden Reason Why Companies Are Cutting Facebook Spending (It's Not Fake News)
text: Reduced marketing budgets, an ad-buying boycott, and new California regulations are leading advertisers to pull out of Facebook.
